Our mission is to connect, educate and empower artists and collectors through the use of blockchain technologies and NFTs !

Why Miami?

We are the most diverse talent pool of young, dynamic and forward thinking professionals at the intersection of art, music, design and technology.

Crypto Community

Tech Workshops

What are NFTs?

NFT stands for Non-Fungible Token. NFTs are a unique encryption on a blockchain used as verifiers while making it absolutely immutable. These digital assets can represent anything from art to digital real estate.
